name: letterboxd_search
description: Search Letterboxd films. Returns results with titles, URLs, and metadata.

steps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('li.search-result').forEach((el,i) => { if(i>=10) return; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h2 a, span.film-title-wrapper a, a'); const yearEl = el.querySelector('small.metadata, span.metadata'); const dirEl = el.querySelector('p.film-metadata a, a.text-sluglist'); const link = titleEl?titleEl.getAttribute('href'):''; results.push({ title: titleEl?titleEl.textContent.trim():'', year: yearEl?yearEl.textContent.trim():'', director: dirEl?dirEl.textContent.trim():'', url: link?'https://letterboxd.com'+link:'' }); }); return { query: '{{query}}', results }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract results
